name: Cedion
description:
Cedion 

Racing game 

A futuristic racing game in the style of the famous wipeout racing games. Large corporations spent a lot of money into these highly dangerous races. Only the best pilots survive the wicked gravity defying tracks. Do you have what it takes to finish the race.

2 unique tracks, 3 vehicles each with 2 different skins

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2014 

  • 3 months time 
  • 2 game students 
  • 18 audio students 
  • 4 film students 
  • 1 programmer
